name: SIARD (Software Independent Archiving of Relational Databases) Version 1.0

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

description: An open format especially designed for archiving relational databases in a vendor-neutral form.  A SIARD file is a ZIP-based archive of files that capture the structure and content of the database tables in XML, together with any BLOB and CLOB data objects.
